website_summaries.verdict: A handy tool specializing in non-lethal, high-impact self defense maneuvers for a safer carrying.
pros: Eliminates any chance of accidental self-injury when carrying
Point can be used for high impact hit
handle can be used for whipping keys
cons: Some buyers wished the product was thicker
Not the best option for heavy-duty self defense

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Self Defense Tool
customer_reviews.text: First off I will say I am a man. I got this because I like training with all kinds of different self-defense tools. I got the ebook before I received the product and the ebook is amazing. It has really good advice including what you should do so hopefully you don't have to use this weapon. The ebook is fully illustrated. The inclusion of the ebook sets this product apart from any other weapon I have ever bought. I can tell that this product was designed by a self-defense expert. Even though I am a trained martial artist, I can say I would not want to mess with anyone carrying this (not that I would ever mess with anyone).
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: When this first arrived I thought maybe this was a flimsy piece of plastic, but then my husband had me test it on a cardboard box. He held the box while I used all my force and this thing cut right through the box. That was all he needed to know!
customer_reviews.author: Kenmareroots

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Sharp and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It fits perfect in my hand and would get the job done, god forbid I'd need to use it. I just wish they had any decent colors/designs. I may paint mine all black.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Ok for now.
customer_reviews.text: It's thinner than I expected. I imagined it would be a quarter of an inch thick but it's less than half of that. The sides are a little thicker, reaching about 1/8th an inch in thickness but the majority of it is so thine it makes me worry about it's durability. Also, bing so flat and thin also makes it harder to hold and I'm almost a foot taller than my wife... I'm going to keep looking for a defense weapon for my wife but it does look inconspicuous.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keychain for my daughter for Christmas. Was quite impressed how it looks and the best part was after I received my order, they sent me an e-book for self defense which is quite extensive! I was so very impressed with that it was very detailed and will definitely be forwarded to her.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Can it really hold up?
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of having a discreet "weapon " for self-defense. I watched the videos and read reviews so I decided to purchase 2, one for my friend and one for myself. They shipped fast and weren't all that expensive. When I opened up the package, I was a little disappointed. The item looks cheap and hardly seems like it would stand up to anything. I was able to slightly bend with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: self defense key ring
customer_reviews.text: very nice grip, super fit into your hand, easy to hold on to, which will matter if a booger gets after you at night, lol❤
customer_reviews.author: lynn howell

customer_reviews.title: Literally the biggest (smallest) POC
customer_reviews.text: Not worth even $1. It is a light weight piece of plastic that isn't even hard. If someone were to attack me I would be a goner because this piece of junk couldn't scare a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Trina S. Shreck

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed glad I took the chance on this !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first was not sure if it was going to be worth the money but wow I was proven wrong it’s so lightweight and very good craftsmanship I love this !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Boucher

customer_reviews.title: For protection. But you can also use your car key.
customer_reviews.text: Great item for protection but you can also use your car key.
customer_reviews.author: Janan

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: You can really hurt your fingers if you miss the target.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: My pool tag had a better “ shank” edge.. Don’t buy... I think in elbow is better with an alarm.. this product is dull and will only cause potential adverse reaction from a predator... Do not waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Stoller

customer_reviews.title: Great Weapon
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty plus it's useful for a weapon. I am educating women on this I hope they order from you
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA L. KASKA

customer_reviews.title: This is a woman’s must have!
customer_reviews.text: Every woman should have one! I’ve had one on my keys for the last few years. Bought this one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: My bf bought it for me as a gift. We also try to practice how to use it. It is easy to hold and lightweight. Overall I think it is a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, makes me feel safe when going out by myself but I really hope I won't have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Yainolix

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, light weight, element of suprise.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this self defense keychain is excellent. It is light weight and is easily held in your hand. It looks like a beautiful keychain, however it is much more than a keychain. This gives you the element of surprise! I will be buying one for my daughter and daughter- in- law. I highly recommend Munio self defense keychain!
customer_reviews.author: Judith  Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it is not what I thought it will be it will break easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This products make an attractive keychain, should pass through any airport scanning device, and should be quite effective if used correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Gforce170

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife and she is extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Frank G. De Luca

customer_reviews.title: Feels strong and well done
customer_reviews.text: Is really pretty, it fits perfectly in my hand, try to hit an armchair and made a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur P.

customer_reviews.title: looks good on the keychain
customer_reviews.text: This is as I expected it is pretty and hopefully will never have to use it but looks good on the keychain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the shape of it and it's pretty easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shape of it and it's pretty easy to use. However, I don't know if it would maybe be just as effective to use your keys as self defense
customer_reviews.author: DelaneyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Key chain is light and easy to carry. However very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Like this key chain, very pretty and serviceable. Hope I never have to use it in self defense, but feel confident It would perform!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Gay

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 16 year old daughter, I love it it not heavy, she can take it with her anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Well ....
customer_reviews.text: Good size but doesn’t seem hard enough to do true damage. Hope I never have to find out though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort nice!
customer_reviews.text: Feel like it could be a little thicker, like the look of it, added extra protection if you have remote key for your car!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel safe and isn’t dangerous to hold when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: NVW

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This product is well worth it! Nice designs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and does not pull on auto ignition ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use and does not pull on auto ignition or cut up my handbag!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: In the right circumstances, could really come in handy!
customer_reviews.text: Is light weight but sturdy...Will order the Dragon Munio, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A Hustler

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Try it out on my husband and I actually kind of hurt him.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lara

customer_reviews.title: Powerful defensive tool for added protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits my hand perfectly. I like the feel and comfort. Well made and strong, but not too heavy. I prefer to hold this with my keys dangling than holding all my keys and it is another great tool for added protection. Hitting attacker in the eye or other pressure point will inflect haulting pain with this defensive tool. I will buy more for gifts. I really like all the various colors and designs as well. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JoLa

product_meta.title: MUNIO Self Defense Kubaton Keychain with Ebook, 16 Designs, Legal in all States
feature_bullets: RECOMMENDED AND TRUSTED BY THE PROS – Have the peace of mind you and your loved ones deserve knowing that MUNIO was DESIGNED BY A SELF DEFENSE EXPERT and is endorsed by Police, Martial Arts and Military professionals worldwide, and incorporated into their self defense classes

FEEL SAFER WHEREVER YOU GO – MUNIO is a discreet, travel friendly and convenient EDC self defense keychain that is ready to use immediately. MUNIO is LEGAL IN ALL STATES and can even be taken on an airplane! MUNIO is NOT BULKY and fits comfortably in your hand and easily in your purse or pocket

VIRTUALLY UNBREAKABLE – MUNIO is MADE IN THE USA of the same strong, lightweight ABS plastic used for sports and tactical safety headgear. MUNIO has been thoroughly impact and strength tested. We are so confident in MUNIO’s strength and durability that it has a LIFETIME WARRANTY. MUNIO is meticulously decorated with designer artwork printed on both sides using scratch and wear resistant UV ink. MUNIO has been lab tested and meets the CPSIA guidelines, making it SAFER AROUND SMALL CHILDREN

EFFECTIVE MORE VERSATILE SOLUTION – Overcomes the disadvantages of other self defense products like pepper spray, stun guns, monkey fists and tactical pens. MUNIO’s more realistic defensive versatility can protect you against a variety of criminal attacks, including surprise attacks from behind. Plus, you won’t worry about accidental chemical spray or electric shock, mechanical failure, wind, shelf life, or, with personal alarms and whistles, hoping to scare off an attacker or alert help in time

BUILD MORE CONFIDENCE WITH FREE TRAINING – Download our fully illustrated E-BOOK, a practical guide to personal safety tips and how you can easily use MUNIO to protect yourself against a variety of common street attacks. You also get complimentary access to our Self Defense Video Series to learn even more simple and effective self defense moves, with and without MUNIO
